mapper.select: select r.no, r.user_no userNo, r.title, r.content, u.name, r.hit, r.reg_date regDate, r.group_no groupNo, r.order_no orderNo, r.depth from rboard r, users u where r.user_no = u.no order by r.no desc
select r.no, r.user_no userNo, r.title, r.content, u.name, r.hit, r.reg_date regDate, r.group_no groupNo, r.order_no orderNo, r.depth from rboard r, users u where r.user_no = u.no and r.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into rboard values(seq_rboard_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, default, sysdate, seq_rboard_no.nextval, default, default )
insert into rboard values(seq_rboard_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, default, sysdate, seq_rboard_no.nextval, default + 1, default + 1 )
mapper.update: update rboard set order_no = order_no+1, depth = depth+1 where no = #{no}
